IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: LA SALLE SCHOOL PROVIDES THERAPEUTIC, EDUCATIONAL AND SUPPORTIVE SERVICES DESIGNED TO ACCOMPLISH POSITIVE, PERSONAL GROWTH AND LASTING CHANGE IN THE LIVES OF YOUTH AND FAMILES IN NEED.
IRS990.MissionDesc: LA SALLE SCHOOL PROVIDES THERAPEUTIC, EDUCATIONAL AND SUPPORTIVE SERVICES DESIGNED TO ACCOMPLISH POSITIVE, PERSONAL GROWTH AND LASTING CHANGE IN THE LIVES OF YOUTH AND FAMILIES IN NEED.
IRS990.Desc: RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT: PROVIDES FOR THE BOARD AN CARE AND RELATED TREATMENT SERVICES FOR A DAILY POPULATION OF APPROXIMATELY 35 ADOLESCENT MALES PLACED INTO RESIDENTIAL CARE BY A GOVERNMENTAL AGENCY OF NYS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: EDUCATIONAL SERVICES: PROVIDES FOR THE EDUCATIONAL SERVICES FOR A DAILY AVERAGE ENROLLMENT OF APPROXIMATELY 65 ADOLESCENT MALES IN GRADES 6 THROUGH 12, IN NY STATE EDUCATION DEPARTMENT APPROVED SPECIAL EDUCATION PROGRAMMING.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: MEDICAL CARE: PROVIDES PRIMARY HEALTH CARE AND BEHAVIORAL HEALTH CARE FOR THE ADOLESCENTS IDENTIFIED EARLIER AS IN THE RESIDENTIAL TREATMENT PROGRAM.

Form990PartVIISectionAGrp.PersonNm: ERIN R DOLEN MS RN CNE

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: INTEREST IN NET ASSETS OF LA SALLE SCHOOL FOUNDATION
DUE FROM AFFILIATE - LA SALLE SCHOOL FOUNDATION
INVESTMENT IN AFFILIATE - CHILDREN'S HEALTH HOME OF UPSTATE NY, LLC

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: LA SALLE FILES FORM 990 ANNUALLY WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE. WHEN ANNUAL RETURNS ARE FILED, SOME TAX POSITIONS TAKEN ARE HIGHLY CERTAIN TO BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAXING AUTHORITIES, WHILE OTHER TAX POSITIONS ARE SUBJECT TO UNCERTAINTY ABOUT THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION OR AMOUNT OF THE POSITION'S TAX BENEFIT THAT WOULD ULTIMATELY BE SUSTAINED. MANAGEMENT EVALUATED LA SALLE'S TAX POSITIONS, INCLUDING INTEREST AND PENALTIES ATTRIBUTABLE THERETO, AND CONCLUDED THAT LA SALLE HAD TAKEN NO TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRED ADJUSTMENT IN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AS OF JUNE 30, 2022 AND 2021.

LA SALLE'S WEB SITE CONTAINS A STATEMENT THAT OUR REFERRAL AND ADMISSION PROCESS IS NON-DISCRIMINATORY WITH RESPECT TO RACE. "LA SALLE SCHOOL DOES NOT DISCRIMINATE IN ADMISSIONS AND THE PROVISION OF SERVICES AND PROGRAMS WITH RESPECT TO RACE, NATIONAL ORIGIN, OR RELIGION."
LA SALLE SCHOOL KEEPS DETAILED RECORDS AND MONITORS THE USE OF ANY CASH ASSISTANCE PROVIDED TO CHILDREN AS ALLOWANCE FUNDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE L, PART IV, LINE 1, COLUMN B:
SCHEDULE L, PART IV, LINE 1, COLUMN D:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ROBERT DIGNUM IS THE PRINCIPAL OF DIGNUM & BAME INSURANCE AGENCY. THE INSURANCE AGENCY WRITES THE SCHOOL'S INSURANCE POLICIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FINANCE AND PERSONNEL COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES WILL REVIEW THE DOCUMENT IN DETAIL PRIOR TO REFERRING IT TO THE FULL BOARD, WITH AN ACCOMPANYING SUMMARY REPORT AS APPROPRIATE, FOR APPROVAL AT A PROPERLY CONVENED MEETING OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUALLY, EACH TRUSTEE AND KEY EMPLOYEE COMPLETES A DISCLOSURE FORM IN WRITING AND SUBMITS IT TO THE CHAIR OF THE BOARD. IN ADDITION TO ANNUAL DISCLOSURE, DISCLOSURE AT THE TIME OF POSSIBLE CONFLICT IS REQUIRED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. THE BOARD IS ABLE TO SECURE COMPENSATION INFORMATION FROM THE STATE ASSOCIATION OF NON-PROFITS TO WHICH LA SALLE BELONGS,AND USES THAT DATA IN REVIEWING AND ESTABLISHING THE COMPENSATION FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, IN SETTING THE COMPENSATION FOR INDIVIDUALS IN THE ORGANIZATION, RELIES ON AVAILABLE COMPARABLE SALARY DATA AND REVIEWS SUCH DECISIONS WITH THE BOARD THROUGH THE ANNUAL BUDGET PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
